itemDescription: stood as a Mebyon Kernow parliamentary candidate for South East Cornwall

wikipedia_page.main: Graham Sandercock is an author, journalist and former teacher living in Cornwall,  UK, who once stood for the UK parliamentary seat of South East Cornwall. He was head of the Geography department at Devonport High School for Boys. He left the school in 2008 after teaching there for 29 years.

response: is a monthly magazine published entirely in the Cornish language. Members contribute articles on various subjects. The magazine is produced by Graham Sandercock who has been its editor since 1976.
*Brown, Wella, J. H. Chesterfield, J. M. Davey, Ray J. Edwards. Graham Sandercock, and R. K. R. Syed, trans. (2004) An Testament Nowydh. Ewny Redreth: Kesva an Taves Kernewek.
